main.name: David Wright
main.bio: I currently work with the State of Utah to automate infrastructure and deployments and encourage others to do likewise. My experience in everything from desktop support to software engineering to system administration has taught me the value of a well documented, automated environment.
main.contactmessage: Want to talk? Drop me a message.

resume.skillmessage: My unique career path has lead proficiency and expertise in a wide variety of technologies

work.title: Technical Support Specialist II
work.description: Worked with a small team to manage a mix of 400+ Redhat, Cent OS and Windows servers. Converted all machines from manually managed installs to SaltStack management. Wrote needed states and modules in python, yaml and jinja. Developed Salt testing protocol and system used by the entire State of Utah.

work.title: Full Stack Developer
work.description: Wrote and maintained application code. Implemented front-end systems using Django templates and Jquery. Developed system-wide web API. Designed and implemented database structure. Setup and maintained Amazon EC2 Linux servers. Designed CI process to streamline developer time.

work.title: Computer Analyst
work.description: Wrote and maintained application code using enterprise APIs. Implemented reports using MySQL and standard web technologies

work.title: IT Support Technician
work.description: Automated Windows installs reducing install time by a factor of 5. Automated call statistics logging and reports. Designed and developed other solutions as necessary to streamline work processes. Acted as training supervisor for the IT Service Desk.

work.title: Freelance Coder
work.description: Developed and implemented unique solutions for clients in a variety of languages including Python, C#, C++, HTML, and JavaScript.

work.title: IT Student Supervisor
work.description: Provided technical support for the Idaho State University Campus. Supported and trained faculty on the entire Office Suite, Internet Explorer, Firefox, Chrome, Banner, Argos and a myriad of other programs and systems. Performed new computer setup and configuration, including format, operating system and standardized software package Recommended and implemented custom solutions for faculty issues after careful consideration of the needs in each situation. Reviewed and wrote documentation, delegating when necessary. Trained new hires, advising them on current computing standards and trends as well as teaching current policies and procedures.

testimonials.text: Dave is an excellent problem solver and has a great deal of experience with a wide variety of technologies. He always sees a problem through to the end. These things make him a great asset to the team.
What can I say? He's my brother.
